channel.title: Unsupervised Learning on Brad Stieber
channel.description: Recent content in Unsupervised Learning on Brad Stieber

item.title: An Introduction to the kmeans Algorithm
item.author: bgstieber@gmail.com (Brad Stieber)
item.description: This post will provide an R code-heavy, math-light introduction to selecting the \(k\) in k means. It presents the main idea of kmeans, demonstrates how to fit a kmeans in R, provides some components of the kmeans fit, and displays some methods for selecting k. In addition, the post provides some helpful functions which may make fitting kmeans a bit easier. kmeans clustering is an example of unsupervised learning, where we do not have an output weâ€™re explicitly trying to predict.
